https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Z2cWpKSykwOfxAo17FZsNkUnGg.jpg The film begins in the present, with its heroine, Kaoru, a grown-up woman working as a real-estate agent, while helping out the folksy proprietor of a neighborhood fishing pond. There she meets a shy girl who needs her help baiting a hook and reminds her of herself in the fourth grade. Dog in a Sidecar
